name: Musical Adventure - Love InteractiveRomance Story
description:
Visual novel game “Musical Adventure - Love Interactive:Romance Story” and the creator of your destiny so think twice before you take your next step. This teenage girl learns that reaching for your dreams is not always easy. Especially because her father doesn’t look on it with a favorable eye.

If you like high school games with a dramatic love romance story line then you will enjoy these thrilling interactive games with choices. Choose your story line and get an extraordinary plot of the greatest love romance story games for free! The destiny of the characters in these stunning romance games is in your hands. So let's see which choices you’ll make.

Download on GooglePlay: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.musicaladventure.lovegames

Download on AppStore: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/musical-adventure-love-game/id1496106922
